main event: A tear drop shaped light was observed in the sky for 10 seconds at Foster AFB, Texas on 10/17/1952.
interesting points: The light was observed sweeping down from a high position relative to an aircraft.,The object made a half spiral to the left before disappearing.,The light had fluorescent bluish-green and reddish-yellow colors.,The conclusion of the report suggested it was a meteor, attributed to an optical illusion or the movement of the observer's aircraft.,No sound was reported during the sighting.
